column5: Does anyone use Norman speed clips?  Are they any good?  What about the musky size ones are they good for big musky?  Thanks for any help.

As far as strength is concerned, they're solid. The problem with them is that your bait has to be attached to them the same way you put on a split ring. Pick up any of your muskie baits and look at how easy that would be...NOT. IMHO
